items.description:
A membership is a requirement for the purchase of any IFB product.  It is a stand-
alone entity, which is billed and paid for separately from any other premium.

membershipNumber.description: The database value of the membership id

membershipClass.description:
voting - has a voting interest in an agricultural concern
associate - ordinary non-voting membership

longevityDate.description: The date the membership was purchased

clientCounty.description: The county that is specifically associated with the Client and this membership.

clientTownship.description: The township that is specifically associated with the Client and this membership.

overrideCounty.description: Use the Client's county by default unless this value overrides

overrideTownship.description: Use the Client's township by default unless this value overrides

clientId.description: The Client id associated with the Membership

doNotRenew.description: Membership will not renew after term date
